story.title: Our Story
story.subtitle: Every love story is beautiful, but ours is our favorite

step1.title: How we met
step1.text: A chance encounter that would change everything. Sometimes the best stories begin when you least expect them.

step2.title: Being besties
step2.text: From strangers to best friends. Late night talks, inside jokes, and a bond that kept growing stronger.

step3.title: Making it official
step3.text: The moment we knew this was more than friendship. Taking the leap and never looking back.

step4.title: Long distance works
step4.text: Miles apart but closer than ever. Proving that true love knows no distance.

step5.title: Traveling
step5.text: Exploring the world together, one adventure at a time. Making memories across the globe.

step6.title: The Proposal
step6.text: One question, one answer, and a lifetime of adventures ahead. She said yes!

step7.title: Today
step7.text: And now, we invite you to celebrate the next chapter of our journey with us.
